alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:07PM MST until December 24 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow and sleet accumulations of 1 to 3 inches and local ice accumulations less than 0.10 inches. * WHERE...Eastport, Athol, Fruitland, Northport, Ione, Schweitzer Mountain Road, Orin-Rice Road, Kettle Falls, Tiger, Flowery Trail Road, Metaline, Newport, Colville, Deer Park, Chewelah, Sandpoint, Springdale-Hunters Road, Metaline Falls, Bonners Ferry, Priest River, and Clark Fork. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
